name: Mined the Gap
description:
Players attempted to flee a wall of magma through a randomly generated mineshaft. For one or two players, most fun on an arcade cabinet. This game was made in 4 days.

Controls:
Controls may only be changed at startup.
"Insert" to insert coins, "1" - Player 1 start, "2" - Player 2 start

Players may jump, dig (+ down, if desired), super dig (costs gold)
Player 1: WASD, N M ,
Player 2: Arrow keys, Numpad 1 2 3

Team:

  • Daniel Praymayer
  • Elysha Riddell
